mojo.description: Initialize a Sling application project by extracting bundles into the correct locations.

parameter.name: additionalBundles
parameter.description: Any additional bundles to include in the project's bundles directory.

parameter.name: base
parameter.description: The definition of the base JAR.

parameter.name: baseDestination
parameter.description: The name of the directory within the output directory into which the base JAR should be installed.

parameter.name: bootDirectory
parameter.description: The directory which contains the bootstrap bundle directories.

parameter.name: buildOutputDirectory
parameter.description: The project's build output directory (i.e. target/classes).

parameter.name: bundleExclusions
parameter.description: Bundles which should be removed from the project's bundles directory.

parameter.name: bundlesDirectory
parameter.description: The directory which contains the start-level bundle directories.

parameter.name: configExcludes
parameter.description: The list of tokens to exclude when copying the configs from partial bundle lists.

parameter.name: configIncludes
parameter.description: The list of tokens to include when copying configs from partial bundle lists.

parameter.name: defaultBundleList
parameter.description: The definition of the defaultBundleList artifact.

parameter.name: includeDefaultBundles
parameter.description: If true, include the default bundles.

parameter.name: jarWebSupport
parameter.description: The definition of the package to be included to provide web support for JAR-packaged projects (i.e. pax-web).

parameter.name: local
parameter.description: Location of the local repository.

parameter.name: packaging
parameter.description: The project's packaging type.

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven project.

parameter.name: propertiesExcludes
parameter.description: The list of names to exclude when copying properties from partial bundle lists.

parameter.name: remoteRepos
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver.

parameter.name: tempDirectory
parameter.description: The temp directory (i.e. target/maven-launchpad-plugintmp).

parameter.name: warOutputDirectory
parameter.description: The output directory for the default bundles in a WAR-packaged project, the base JAR (in the subdirectory named in the baseDestination parameter), and any additional bundles.

mojo.description: Displays all bundles that have newer versions available. Highly based upon the display-dependency-updates goal from the Versions plugin.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

parameter.name: session
parameter.description: The Maven Session.

mojo.description: Attaches the bundle list as a project artifact.

mojo.description: Initialize a Sling integration test webapp by extracting bundles into the correct locations, including the current artifact.

parameter.name: additionalBundles
parameter.description: Any additional bundles to include in the project's bundles directory.

parameter.name: base
parameter.description: The definition of the base JAR.

parameter.name: baseDestination
parameter.description: The name of the directory within the output directory into which the base JAR should be installed.

parameter.name: bootDirectory
parameter.description: The directory which contains the bootstrap bundle directories.

parameter.name: buildDirectory
parameter.description: The project's build directory (i.e. target).

parameter.name: buildOutputDirectory
parameter.description: The project's build output directory (i.e. target/classes).

parameter.name: bundleExclusions
parameter.description: Bundles which should be removed from the project's bundles directory.

parameter.name: bundlesDirectory
parameter.description: The directory which contains the start-level bundle directories.

parameter.name: configExcludes
parameter.description: The list of tokens to exclude when copying the configs from partial bundle lists.

parameter.name: configIncludes
parameter.description: The list of tokens to include when copying configs from partial bundle lists.

parameter.name: defaultBundleList
parameter.description: The definition of the defaultBundleList artifact.

parameter.name: includeDefaultBundles
parameter.description: If true, include the default bundles.

parameter.name: jarWebSupport
parameter.description: The definition of the package to be included to provide web support for JAR-packaged projects (i.e. pax-web).

parameter.name: local
parameter.description: Location of the local repository.

parameter.name: outputDirectory
parameter.description: The output directory for bundles.

parameter.name: packaging
parameter.description: The project's packaging type.

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven project.

parameter.name: propertiesExcludes
parameter.description: The list of names to exclude when copying properties from partial bundle lists.

parameter.name: remoteRepos
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver.

parameter.name: startLevel
parameter.description: The start level for the current artifact.

parameter.name: tempDirectory
parameter.description: The temp directory (i.e. target/maven-launchpad-plugintmp).

parameter.name: warOutputDirectory
parameter.description: The output directory for the default bundles in a WAR-packaged project, the base JAR (in the subdirectory named in the baseDestination parameter), and any additional bundles.
